verses.verse: And there shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H2415>rod<s%> out of the <S%H1503>stem<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>, and a <S%H5342>Branch<s%> shall <S%H6509>grow<s%> out of his <S%H8328>roots<s%>:

And the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5117>rest<s%> upon <S%H7307>him<s%>, the spirit of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H998>understanding<s%>, the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H1369>might<s%>, the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and of the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>;

And shall make him of quick <S%H7306>understanding<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and he shall not <S%H8199>judge<s%> after the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, neither <S%H3198>reprove<s%> after the <S%H4926>hearing<s%> of his <S%H241>ears<s%>:

But with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shall he <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%>, and <S%H3198>reprove<s%> with <S%H4334>equity<s%> for the <S%H6035>meek<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and he shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and with the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall he <S%H4191>kill<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
And <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shall be the <S%H232>belt<s%> of his <S%H4975>body<s%>, and <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> the <S%H232>belt<s%> of his <S%H2504>mind<s%>.

The <S%H2061>wolf<s%> also shall <S%H1481>live<s%> with the <S%H3532>lamb<s%>, and the <S%H5246>leopard<s%> shall lie <S%H7257>down<s%> with the <S%H1423>kid<s%>; and the <S%H5695>calf<s%> and the young <S%H3715>lion<s%> and the <S%H4806>fatling<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>; and a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5288>child<s%> shall lead <S%H5090>them<s%>.

And the <S%H6510>cow<s%> and the <S%H1677>bear<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed<s%>; their young <S%H3206>ones<s%> shall lie <S%H7257>down<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>: and the <S%H738>lion<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> like the <S%H1241>ox<s%>.

And the sucking <S%H3243>child<s%> shall <S%H8173>play<s%> on the <S%H2352>hole<s%> of the <S%H6620>asp<s%>, and the weaned <S%H1580>child<s%> shall <S%H1911>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H6848>cockatrice<s%>' <S%H3975>den<s%>.

They shall not <S%H7489>hurt<s%> nor <S%H7843>destroy<s%> in all my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>: for the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be a <S%H8328>root<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>, which shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> for a <S%H5251>ensign<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>; to it shall the <S%H1471>Nations<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%>: and his <S%H4496>rest<s%> shall be <S%H3519>glorious<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall <S%H3254>set<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%> to <S%H7069>recover<s%> the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%>, which shall be <S%H7604>left<s%>, from <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and from <S%H6624>Pathros<s%>, and from <S%H3568>Cush<s%>, and from <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, and from <S%H8152>Shinar<s%>, and from <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>, and from the <S%H339>islands<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

And he shall set <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>ensign<s%> for the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and shall <S%H622>assemble<s%> the <S%H1760>outcasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and gather <S%H6908>together<s%> the <S%H5310>dispersed<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> from the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>corners<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

The <S%H7068>envy<s%> also of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%>, and the <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>: <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall not <S%H7065>envy<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall not <S%H6887>trouble<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>.

But they shall <S%H5774>fly<s%> upon the <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> toward the <S%H3220>west<s%>; they shall <S%H962>plunder<s%> <S%H1121>them<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>: they shall <S%H4916>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H123>Edom<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> shall obey <S%H4928>them<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptian<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>; and with his <S%H5868>mighty<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall he <S%H5130>shake<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H5104>river<s%>, and shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> it into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5158>streams<s%>, and make men go <S%H1869>over<s%> <S%H5275>dryshod<s%>.

And there shall be a <S%H4546>highway<s%> for the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H834>which<s%> shall be <S%H7604>left<s%>, from <S%H804>Assyria<s%>; like as it was to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
